channel.title: Are dApps overly decentralized (or centralized)?
channel.description:
There’s a ideal ratio for the optimal decentralized application, but very few dApps ever reach it.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/are-dapps-overly-decentralized-or-centralized/
